  #include <bits/stdc++.>
  using namespace std;
  const int N = 200000 * 2 + 50;
  const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
  int n, a[200000 + 50], fact[N], invfact[N];
  int mod_exp(int b, int e) {
      int res = 1;
      while (e) {
          if (e & 1) res = 1LL * res * b % MOD;
          b = 1LL * b * b % MOD;
          e /= 2;
      }
      return res;
  }
  int C(int n, int k) {
      if (k < 0 || k > n) return 0;
      return 1LL * fact[n] * invfact[k] % MOD * invfact[n - k] % MOD;
  }
  int main() {
      fact[0] = 1;
      for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) fact[i] = 1LL * fact[i-1] * i % MOD;
      invfact[N-1] = mod_exp(fact[N-1], MOD-2);
      for (int i = N-2; i >= 0; i--) invfact[i] = 1LL * invfact[i+1] * (i+1) % MOD;
      scanf("%d", &n);
      for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);
      int ans = 0;
      for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {
          if (a[i] == 0) break;
          ans = (ans + C(i + a[i], i+1)) % MOD;
      }
      printf("%d\n", ans);
  }
